name: Revea1
description:
My entry to the Unreal Engine Spring Jam 2020.

This game is a mix of storygame, puzzle platform, side scroll shooter, and top down flying shoot em up.

Your character is RLV-01 droid.

Download, extract, and play.

You can use keyboard and mouse, or game pad control. Menu system fully supports game pads. Keyboard Arrows for Movement/Jump. Space bar to fire weapon.
